mapper.select: SELECT * FROM qna ORDER BY qna_no DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into qna(qna_no, qna_title, qna_content, qna_writer, qna_pw) values(#{qna_no}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, #{qna_writer}, #{qna_pw})
mapper.delete: delete from qna where qna_no = #{qna_no} and qna_pw = #{qna_pw}
